title: Medicare's Rural Reckoning
prompt: A worn wooden desk in a small-town hospital administrative office, morning light filtering through a window onto scattered papers with Medicare billing codes and payment schedules, a coffee cup and reading glasses nearby, the administrator's hands (out of focus in background) visible at the edge of the frame, with a wall calendar and muted landscape visible through the window showing farmland or quiet main streetâ€”captured in soft, documentary-style photography that conveys the quiet burden of financial strain without melodrama.
